name: Miguel Morales
bio: Miguel Morales, a towering presence in the goal, is known for his acrobatic saves and commanding voice that organizes the defense. With roots in the heart of Mexico, he embodies agility and determination, often inspiring his teammates with his relentless work ethic and commitment to the Yucatán Force. His quick reflexes and ability to read the game make him a formidable guardian against any attack.
